actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to seek the resurrection of the Ukrainian Orthodox and Catholic Churches in Ukraine.

summary.text: Declares the sense of Congress that the President shall take steps to: (1) call upon the Soviet Union to permit the resurrection of the Ukrainian Orthodox and Catholic Churches; (2) contact the officials of the Soviet Union to secure freedom of worship in the Soviet Union and Eastern Europe; and (3) raise the question of Stalin's liquidation of such churches in the United Nations.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to seek the resurrection of the Ukrainian Orthodox and Catholic Churches in Ukraine.
